import Data.List (group)

-- | Generates the sequence of prime numbers.
-- Based on <http://qiita.com/little_Haskeller/items/614a3ae20a517c19bb1f this article> .
primes2 :: Integral a => [a]
primes2 = map fromIntegral primes2'
    where
        primes2' = [2, 3, 5] ++ sieve2 5 7 (drop 2 primes2')
        sieve2 m s (p : ps) = [n | n <- ns, gcd m n == 1] ++ sieve2 (m * p) (p * p) ps
            where ns = [x + y | x <- [s, s + 6 .. p * p - 2], y <- [0, 4]]

-- | Factorizes the given integer using 'primes2'.
-- Based on <https://wiki.haskell.org/Testing_primality this page>.
factorize2 :: Integral a => a -> [a]
factorize2 1 = []
factorize2 n = factorize2' n primes2
    where
        factorize2' n ps@(p : pr)
            | p * p > n    = [n]
            | m == 0       = p : factorize2' d ps
            | otherwise    = factorize2' n pr
            where (d, m) = divMod n p

solve :: Int -> Int
solve l = (`div` 2) $ (1 +) $ product $
    map (\ek -> 2 * ek + 1) $ map length $ group $ factorize2 l

main :: IO ()
main = putStr . unlines . map show .
    map solve . takeWhile (/= 0) . map read . lines =<< getContents

### constant

MAX_P = 10 ** 6

### subroutines

def gen_primes(max_p)
  primes = Array.new(max_p + 1){true}
  primes[0] = primes[1] = false

  s_max_p = Math.sqrt(max_p + 0.5).to_i

  for p in (2..s_max_p)
    if primes[p]
      for q in (p * p).step(max_p, p)
        primes[q] = false
      end
    end
  end

  primes
end

### main

primes = gen_primes(MAX_P)
pnums = (2..MAX_P).select{|p| primes[p]}
#p pnums.length; exit

loop do
  l = gets.to_i
  break if l == 0

  count = 1

  for pn in pnums
    break if l == 1

    f = 0
    while l % pn == 0
      l /= pn
      f += 1
    end

    if f > 0
      count *= ((f + 1) * 2 - 1)
    end
  end

  puts (count + 1) / 2
end

### constant

MAX_P = 10 ** 6

### subroutines

def gen_primes(max_p)
  primes = Array.new(max_p + 1){true}
  primes[0] = primes[1] = false

  s_max_p = Math.sqrt(max_p + 0.5).to_i

  for p in (2..s_max_p)
    if primes[p]
      for q in (p * p).step(max_p, p)
        primes[q] = false
      end
    end
  end

  primes
end

### main

primes = gen_primes(MAX_P)
pnums = (2..MAX_P).select{|p| primes[p]}
#p pnums.length; exit

loop do
  l = gets.to_i
  break if l == 0

  count = 1

  for pn in pnums
    break if l == 1

    f = 0
    while l % pn == 0
      l /= pn
      f += 1
    end

    if f > 0
      count *= ((f + 1) * 2 - 1)
    end
  end

  if l > 1
    count *= 3
  end

  puts (count + 1) / 2
end

<?php
  /*
    AOJ 1060
    Title:No Story
    @kankichi573
   */
function soinsuu_bunkai($n,&$primes,&$shurui)
{
  $shurui=0;
  if(($n % 2)==0)
    {
      $shurui=1;
      $primes[2]=1;
      $n /= 2;
      while(($n % 2)==0)
	{
	  $primes[2]++;
	  $n /= 2;
	}
    }
  for($i=3;$i<=sqrt($n);$i+=2)
    {
      if(($n % $i)==0)
	{
	  $shurui++;
	  $primes[$i]=1;
	  $n /= $i;
	  while(($n % $i)==0)
	    {
	      $primes[$i]++;
	      $n /= $i;
	    }
	}
    }
  if($n>1)
    {
      $shurui++;
      $primes[$n]=1;
    }
}

function my_expand($pr,&$ar)
{
  $i=0;
  foreach($pr as $val)
    {
      $ar[$i]=$val;
      $i++;
    }
}
function ways($bit_pattern,$pr,$n)
{
  $ret=1;
  for($i=0,$pat=1;$i<$n;$i++,$pat <<=1)
    {
      if(!($bit_pattern & $pat))
	$ret *= $pr[$i];
    }
  return($ret);
}
/*
  exmaple 
  arg=1,1   => 5
  arg=1,1,1 => 14
  arg=1,1,2 => 23
  arg=1,1,1,1 => 41
 */
function solve($pr,$n)
{
  $myarray=array();
  // soinsuubunkai no kekka kara
  // bekijou no jouhou dake kiridasu
  my_expand($pr,$myarray);

  $fullbit=(1<<$n)-1;

  $ret=0;
  for($i=$fullbit;$i>0;$i--)
    for($j=0;$j<=$i;$j++)
      {
	if(($i | $j) == $fullbit)
	  {
	    //fprintf(STDOUT,"%d %d",$i,$j);
	    //fprintf(STDOUT,":%d %d\n",ways($i,$myarray,$n)
	    //	    ,ways($j,$myarray,$n));
	    $ret += ways($i,$myarray,$n)*ways($j,$myarray,$n);
	  }
      }
  return($ret);
}



while(fscanf(STDIN,"%d",$n) && $n)
{
  $primes=array();

  soinsuu_bunkai($n,$primes,$shurui);

  $ret=solve($primes,$shurui);

  printf("%d\n",$ret);

}

return(0);
?>

<?php
  /*
    AOJ 1060
    Title:No Story
    @kankichi573
   */
function soinsuu_bunkai($n,&$primes,&$shurui)
{
  $shurui=0;
  if(bcmod($n,"2")==0)
    {
      $shurui=1;
      $primes[2]=1;
      $n = bcdiv($n,"2");
      while(bcmod($n,"2")==0)
	{
	  $primes[2]++;
	  $n = bcdiv($n,"2");
	}
    }
  for($i=3;bcmul($i,$i)<=$n;$i+=2)
    {
      if(bcmod($n,$i)==0)
	{
	  $shurui++;
	  $primes[$i]=1;
	  $n /= $i;
	  while(bcmod($n,$i)==0)
	    {
	      $primes[$i]++;
	      $n = bcdiv($n,$i);
	    }
	}
    }
  if($n>1)
    {
      $shurui++;
      $primes[$n]=1;
    }
}

function my_expand($pr,&$ar)
{
  $i=0;
  foreach($pr as $val)
    {
      $ar[$i]=$val;
      $i++;
    }
}
function ways($bit_pattern,$pr,$n)
{
  $ret=1;
  for($i=0,$pat=1;$i<$n;$i++,$pat <<=1)
    {
      if(!($bit_pattern & $pat))
	$ret *= $pr[$i];
    }
  return($ret);
}
/*
  exmaple 
  arg=1,1   => 5
  arg=1,1,1 => 14
  arg=1,1,2 => 23
  arg=1,1,1,1 => 41
 */
function solve($pr,$n)
{
  $myarray=array();
  // soinsuubunkai no kekka kara
  // bekijou no jouhou dake kiridasu
  my_expand($pr,$myarray);

  $fullbit=(1<<$n)-1;

  $ret=0;
  for($i=$fullbit;$i>0;$i--)
    for($j=0;$j<=$i;$j++)
      {
	if(($i | $j) == $fullbit)
	  {
	    //fprintf(STDOUT,"%d %d",$i,$j);
	    //fprintf(STDOUT,":%d %d\n",ways($i,$myarray,$n)
	    //	    ,ways($j,$myarray,$n));
	    $ret += ways($i,$myarray,$n)*ways($j,$myarray,$n);
	  }
      }
  return($ret);
}



while(fscanf(STDIN,"%s",$n) && $n)
{
  $primes=array();

  soinsuu_bunkai($n,$primes,$shurui);

  //var_dump($primes);
  $ret=solve($primes,$shurui);

  printf("%d\n",$ret);

}

return(0);
?>
